explains: adj. 镇压的，压制的；压抑的，抑制的

sentences.en: He criticized the repressive methods employed by the country's government.
sentences.cn: 他指责了这个国家政府采取的镇压手段。

sentences.en: In any society, there is always an evil repressive force at work.
sentences.cn: 在任何社会中，总有一股邪恶压抑的力量在起作用。

sentences.en: And that repressive justice does nothing for their children.
sentences.cn: 压制正义对他们的孩子一点好处都没有。
